title: Tollen Arrivals
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship navigates Tollen's intrigues
summary: The party departs Uzgukhar on an airship, covering vast distances each day.
They encounter and survive an acidic ooze attack in the ruined Isingue.
Upon reaching Tollen, they negotiate with local authorities for the city's safety.
Splitting up, members of the party rekindle old acquaintances and gather information.
They end the day at The Windward Sail, learning about local figures and rumors.
The following morning, they meet with the elf Melindir who advises caution with Caelynn and speaks of a Skaer curse.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship arrives in Tollen, seeking allies and information while reminiscing and facing local threats.
